content.rendered:
Directed by Kiranraj K

Written by Kiranraj K. K.N. Vijay Kumar. Satheesh Muthukulam. Sanjay Upadhyay

Star Rakshit Shetty (Dharma). Charlie (Charlie). Sangeetha Sringeri (Devika). Raj B. Shetty (Dr. Ashwin Kumar). Bobby Simha (Vamsi Nandhan). Danish Sait (Karshan Roy). Sharvari (Adhrika). Hani Yadav (Vishal arora). Nikhil Yadav (Rahul). Aniruddh Roy (Gautham). Harini (Dharma’s mother). Siddharth Bhat (Dharma’s father). Praanya P. Rao (Dharma’s sister). Anirudh Mahesh (Uttam, Dharma’s colleague). Gopalkrishna Deshpande (Prabhakaran). Abhijit Mahesh (Compounder). Bengaluru Nagesh (Dharma’s neighbour). Salman Ahmed (Manju). Dhanraj Shivkumar (Vicky). Vijay Vikram Singh (Suhashta Chawla). H.G. Somashekar Rao (Tea stall owner). Bhargavi Narayan (Tea stall owner’s wife). Kiranraj K (North Indian hotel owner (cameo))

Language Kannada

Producers G.S. Guptha. Rakshit Shetty

Production Paramvah Studios
